column5: Beautiful .53 acre lot with tons of trees and shady areas. Pool in the backyard. This house has been completely updated and is gorgeous. New, luxurious mattresses, high quality linens and towels, stocked kitchen, brand new kitchen appliances, oversized luxury washer and dryer, tons of space, and a gym as well. Hi speed wifi, Direct TV, HDTV in every bedroom and two in the living area. FABULOUS HOUSE!!! A great value for the quality and number of adults it sleeps.
column8: Luxury 5 bedroom. Huge yard. Pool. By Stadium.
